column1: in memory of janet marie westbye jorgensen -- marshall & marshall funeral directors| janet marie westbye jorgensen. january 4
column12: after a long battle with cancer. visitation will be held from 11:00 - 12:30 p. m.
column16: at marshall and marshall funeral directors in whitney
column17: tx. a graveside service will follow at 1:00 p. m.
column18: at whitney memorial park in whitney. she will lie in state from 9:00 a. m. until 5:00 p. m.
column21: 2015 at the funeral home. janet was born on january 4
column24: the daughter of the late edward westbye and dolor meyer. she was a stay-at-home mom and loved crafting
column27: shopping at flea markets finding those special items and meeting new people. she was preceded in death by her first husband
column28: john jorgensen and her second husband
column29: bill lehtola. survivors include her daughters
column31: of wyoming; cheryl meyer-smith and significant other arthur
column32: of wisconsin; sandra stahl of texas; teresa burdick and significant other tony
column33: of wisconsin; michelle lehtola-johnson and spouse paul

column58: michael johnson; and many great-grandchildren. the family of janet westbye jorgensen wishes to thank senior care of windcrest (formerly tri-sun) and vitas (hospice) for lovingly taking care of our mother.
